thread.title: Elizabeth Meredith

author: Elizabeth Meredith
title: Elizabeth Meredith
text: I was looking for a difficult DVD to find and was weary and surprised when this site had it for sale. Gave them a shot, and was amazed by quality of product and service, and speed of shipping and receiving the item!!!! The care and professionalism taken in packaging item for shipping was great!! I did have questions and emailed them and recurved quick, thorough and simple instructions on how to resolve my issue. Will purchase from them again for sure and after seeing the brochure sent with my DVD the possibilities of finding those vintage shows and movies are finally possible and endless!!!! Great place, great service, and great employees
